channel.title: Astro Software Runtime Release Notes
channel.description: Astronomer is committed to continuous delivery of both features and bug fixes to Astro. To keep your team up to date on what's new, this document will provide a regular summary of all changes released to Astro Software.

item.title: sidebar_label: 'Astro Runtime' title: 'Astro Runtime release notes' id: runtime-release-notes description: Release notes for Astro Runtime, the differentiated Apache Airflow experience and execution framework.
Astro Runtime 6.0.4
